pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===================Heat Tempest Plugin===================Tests can be run as a tempest plugin against any heat-enabled OpenStackcloud, however defaults match running against a recent DevStack.To run the tests against DevStack, do the following: # Define DEST export DEST=/opt/stack # create test resources and write tempest config $DEST/heat/heat_integrationtests/prepare_test_env.sh $DEST/heat/heat_integrationtests/prepare_test_network.sh # run tempest selecting only these tests cd $DEST/tempest tempest run --regex heat_tempest_plugin.testsIf custom configuration is required, edit the [heat_plugin] section of $DEST/tempest/etc/tempest.conf
